info.name: Kenya SME Cybersecurity API

request.description: Get access token for authentication

query.description: Security status: secure, vulnerable, compromised, or unknown

request.description: Update device security status
Get all threats for a device
Get all vulnerabilities for a device

body.raw:
{
    "organizationId": "{{orgId}}",
    "deviceId": "{{deviceId}}",
    "cveId": "CVE-2023-12345",
    "title": "Remote Code Execution in Web Server",
    "description": "A vulnerability that allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code",
    "severity": "critical",
    "cvssScore": 9.8,
    "affectedSoftware": "Nginx",
    "affectedVersion": "1.18.0",
    "remediationSteps": "Update to the latest version",
    "patchAvailable": true,
    "patchLink": "https://example.com/security-patch",
    "exploitAvailable": true,
    "status": "open"
}

request.description: Create a new vulnerability
Update a vulnerability by ID
Delete a vulnerability by ID (admin only)
Get vulnerability statistics for an organization
Get a list of logs with optional filtering
Get a single log by ID

body.raw:
{
    "organizationId": "{{orgId}}",
    "deviceId": "{{deviceId}}",
    "source": "firewall",
    "eventType": "connection_blocked",
    "level": "warning",
    "message": "Connection blocked from suspicious IP address",
    "metadata": {
        "sourceIp": "203.0.113.100",
        "destinationPort": 22,
        "protocol": "tcp"
    },
    "ipAddress": "203.0.113.100",
    "isAnomalous": true,
    "anomalyScore": 0.75
}

Get a list of AI models with optional filtering

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Malware Detection Model",
    "type": "CNN",
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "description": "Convolutional Neural Network for malware detection",
    "parameters": {
        "layers": 5,
        "neurons": [64, 128, 256, 128, 64],
        "activation": "relu"
    },
    "trainingMetrics": {
        "epochs": 100,
        "batchSize": 32
    },
    "accuracy": 0.95,
    "precision": 0.94,
    "recall": 0.96,
    "f1Score": 0.95,
    "falsePositiveRate": 0.03,
    "status": "active",
    "threatTypesDetected": ["malware", "ransomware"]
}

request.description: Create a new AI model (admin only)
Update an AI model by ID (admin only)
Delete an AI model by ID (admin only)

item.name: Get Active Model for Threat Type

request.description: Get the best active AI model for a specific threat type
Mark an AI model as deprecated (admin only)
Mark an AI model as active (admin only)
Get a list of dashboard widgets with optional filtering
Get a single dashboard widget by ID
Create a new dashboard widget
Update a dashboard widget by ID
Delete a dashboard widget by ID
Update multiple dashboard widgets' positions at once (for drag-and-drop layouts)
Get default configuration for a specific widget type
Get a list of training datasets with optional filtering (admin or analyst role required)
Get a single training dataset by ID (admin or analyst role required)

body.raw:
{
    "dataType": "traffic",
    "description": "Network traffic data for training anomaly detection models",
    "sourceOrganizations": ["{{orgId}}"],
    "dataFormat": "CSV",
    "features": ["timestamp", "source_ip", "destination_ip", "protocol", "bytes", "packets"],
    "samples": 10000,
    "labelled": true,
    "dataSplits": {
        "training": 0.7,
        "validation": 0.15,
        "testing": 0.15
    },
    "preprocessingSteps": ["normalization", "outlier_removal"],
    "status": "collecting",
    "storageLocation": "s3://cybersec-training-data/traffic/"
}

Update a training dataset's status (admin or analyst role required)
Get training datasets by data type (admin or analyst role required)
Add source organizations to a training dataset (admin role required)
